TITLE: Basic Component Usage Example
DESCRIPTION: Example Razor component showing how to use Display and Button components with event handling
SOURCE: https://github.com/dotnetcore/bootstrapblazor/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: razor
CODE:
```
<Display Value="@_text"></Display>
<Button Text="Button" OnClick="@ClickButton"></Button>

@code {
    private string? _text;
    private void ClickButton(MouseEventArgs e)
    {
        _text = DateTime.Now.ToString();
    }
}
```
